title: Resolve Debit Card Dispute (Provisional Credit)
description: A customer disputes a transaction. After an initial investigation, the bank issues a provisional credit while the full investigation continues.

tasks.description: Log the customer's dispute for a $200 charge they don't recognize.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully files the dispute in the system.

tasks.description: Based on regulations (Reg E), issue a provisional credit for the disputed amount to the customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent applies a temporary credit of $200 to the customer's account.

tasks.description: Send a letter to the customer explaining the provisional credit and the next steps in the investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal communication to the customer about the status of their dispute.
